tabs.title: Introduction
tabs.content:
"I don't pretend we have all the answers. But the questions are certainly worth thinking about".

-Arthur C. Clarke


Play. Laugh. Pounce.

k! School quiz, one of the city's most prestigious and most competitive school quiz, is a baptism by fire for the budding quizzer. It opens up the gateway to the world of competitive quizzing, moulding the participants for much more to come. Most importantly, it's not the answers but the inquisitiveness that matters.

tabs.title: Rules and Format
tabs.content:
» The quiz has two sections– Prelims and Finals
» Top eight teams in the Prelims qualify for the finals.
» Top three teams in the finals get cash prizes
» A maximum of three members per team will be allowed.
» Only for school students.  Cross-school teams are allowed.
» The domain of the questions will be general, anything under the sun.
